Function FizzBuzz.
```{r}
FizzBuzz <- function(n)
  {
  vec <- c()
  
  for (x in 1:n) {
       if(x %% 3 == 0 && x %% 5 == 0)
       {
            vec <- append(vec, "Fizz Buzz")
       }
       else if(x %% 3 == 0)
       {
            vec <- append(vec, "Fizz")
       }
       else if(x %% 5 == 0)
       {
            vec <- append(vec, "Buzz")
       }
       else 
       {
            vec <- append(vec, x)
       }
  } 
  print(vec)
}

```
